sentences.en: As to the number of degenerate vibrations some further considerations are necessary.
sentences.cn: 关于简并振动的数目的问题,还需要做进一步的研究.

sentences.en: At this point arguments seem to degenerate into emotional displays.
sentences.cn: 在此,争论似乎沦为情绪发泄.

sentences.en: Chaos and degenerate is the only truth of the universe.
sentences.cn: “混乱和堕落才是宇宙中唯一的真理”?

sentences.en: During 1937 the German museums were systematically purged of " degenerate art ".
sentences.cn: 1937年期间 “ 退化艺术 ” 被系统地从德国各博物馆清除掉.

sentences.en: He didn't let riches and luxury make him degenerate.
sentences.cn: 他不因财富和奢华而自甘堕落.

sentences.en: Inactivity can make your joints stiff, and the bones may begin to degenerate.
sentences.cn: 不活动会使关节僵硬，骨骼因此可能会开始退化。

sentences.en: It can always be arranged that degenerate eigenfunctions are orthogonal.
sentences.cn: 总可以做到使得简并的本征函数是正交的.

sentences.en: Methods: The erm genes of MRCNS were detected by degenerate primers amplification.
sentences.cn: 方法 　 应用兼并引物扩增MRCNS菌的erm基因.

sentences.en: Nazism suppressed all three movements as degenerate.
sentences.cn: 纳粹把所有三个运动都作为颓废艺术而加以镇压.

sentences.en: The circular points are really a degenerate conic.
sentences.cn: 虚圆点实际上是一退化的二次曲线.

sentences.en: The newly emerging forces are bound to defeat what is corrupt and degenerate.
sentences.cn: 新生力量必然战胜腐朽力量.
这幅画被谴责为 “有伤风化” 。

sentences.en: These new blood vessels will begin to degenerate.
sentences.cn: 这些新生的血管将开始变形.

sentences.en: We don't want this topic to degenerate into the discussion phase.
sentences.cn: 我可不想把这个当做讨论的话题.

sentences.en: We must not allow our necessary scepticism to degenerate into cynicism.
sentences.cn: 我们不应让必要的怀疑态度滑向玩世不恭.

sentences.en: Will too much freedom make them degenerate?
sentences.cn: 太多的自由会令他们堕落 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 退化；[物] 简并；堕落；退步
退化；[医] 变性；堕落；恶化

trans.tran_en: someone whose behaviour is considered to be morally unacceptable
someone whose behaviour is considered to be morally unacceptable
